room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Amazing place to bring your family and friends! I have been there twice (pirate, and chainsaw) and each time we always have a blast. The staff are extremely nice and helpful. You have to give this place a try at least once!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: We had a group of 10 go into the Chainsaw room and even though we didn't escape we had a blast! I want to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: We decided on a family outgoing, my nieces love solving puzzles. We did the Chainsaw and what a challenge it was. Needless to say, we didn't make it out, but we had a marvelous time. The staff was outstanding, definitely a place to go. We'll be back until we finally escape. Thank you again for a wonderful time!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Such an awesome and fun experience! Can't wait to go back and try the other room. The 2 brothers that own it were super helpful and have a desire to make this an awesome experience for everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Chainsaw" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: My group and I had so much fun at Trapped. We've never done anything like this before and we couldn't stop talking about it after! There were so many clever twists and turns. Everyone was so friendly. We can't wait until all the rooms are done so we can go back!
